descriptionHTML:
Now 60% Discount! (Limited offer)

Pure analog is an analog watch face. A beautiful design with a battery indicator and second timezone.

2 Day Money Back Guarantee
We extend the standard 2 hours refund policy of the Google Play Store to 2 days so you can take your time trying the watch face. If you are not completely satisfied you can apply for a refund by sending us your order statement by email within 2 days. We will refund your money.
If you want a refund within 2 hours of purchase please use the Play Store Refund button in the Google Play page for the app.

To install:

1. Install the app on your phone. The Pure Analog watch face should appear within a minute or so. If not then run 'Resync app' from the settings in the Android Wear App.
2. Wait for the resync to complete. It can still take a few minutes for the watch face to appear in the Android Wear App.
3. Select the watch face from the Android Wear App or long press your android wear watch and select Pure Analog

4. When the Pure Analog watch face is activated on your watch you can tap the Pure Analog watch face in the Android Wear App to get to the settings screen.
comments: Great watch face Everything I want, but would love an ambient mode to save my LG G Watch R screen from burn in!

L.Euric This watch definitely does not look anything like the advertised picture (except the one image showing a men wearing the Moto . It looks super 2D on my G Watch R. Not worth it, unless they can make the graphic looks MORE realistic than the built in "realistic" setting.
Really good Very good timezone watch. Well made and 3 design colours. Not impressed with the paid for watches, but like this.

Amber Face The Amber Face blocks access to notification.  Moto 360.                    Developer recommend restart of Moto 360.  Works fine.  Do not use because the Face is too cluttered to easily read. Looks better on the Play Store
Love this watch face. More colors in the future would be awesome.
Love this face My favourite face. Doesn't drain the battery like so many other pretty faces.
recentChanges: By default the watch will use the new graphics engine. If you prefer the old graphics you can select "Classic" in the settings screen on your mobile phone.
